title: FOR IMMEDIATE DOWNLOAD:
content:
FOR IMMEDIATE DOWNLOAD:   
   
Announcing Typophile Downloads   
   
 [http://typophile.com/downloads](http://web.archive.org/web/20140712150427/http:/typophile.com/downloads)   
   
Already available: Free desktop pics, a   
lettering grid, a bitmap grid for Illustrator and more.   
   
Further, once your typeface has survived the   
Typophile Critique, download and import the   
Basic Kerning Pairs file to fine tune your   
kerning then use Ruder's ever useful spacing   
test for your nearly completed fonts.   
   
Call to the type community: Submit your useful   
tools, type helps and desktop images.   
   
Enjoy.   
   
Typophile
author: Joe Pemberton
